question.en-US: Where is the closest dining table in relation to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的餐桌在哪里?
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅餐桌喺邊度？

question.en-US: Can you tell me the location of the closest chair to me?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我离我最近的椅子的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我离我最近嘅椅子嘅位置啊？

question.en-US: Which way should I look to find the chair from here?
question.zh-CN: 我应该从这里往哪个方向寻找椅子？
question.zh-HK: 我應該從這裡往哪個方向尋找椅子？

question.en-US: Can you please locate the dining table?
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以搵到餐桌啊？

question.en-US: Can you point out the bottle in the scene?
question.zh-CN: 你能指出场景中的瓶子吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以指出場景中嘅瓶子啊？

question.en-US: In which direction is the chair from my current position?
question.zh-CN: 椅子在我当前位置的什么方向?
question.zh-HK: 椅子由我而家嘅位置喺邊個方向？

question.en-US: What is the position of the nearest dining table relative to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的餐桌的位置是什么？
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅餐桌嘅位置係乜嘢？

question.en-US: Could you point out the location of the potted plant to me?
question.zh-CN: 你能给我指出盆栽的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以畀我指出盆栽嘅位置啊？

question.en-US: In which direction is the chair from my current position?
question.zh-CN: 椅子在我当前位置的什么方向?
question.zh-HK: 椅子由我而家嘅位置喺邊個方向？

question.en-US: Could you identify where the dining table is?
question.zh-CN: 你能确定餐桌在哪里吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能肯定餐桌喺邊度呀？
